#Text=Chelo Vivares

#Text=Chelo Vivares ( born Consuelo Vivares ; April 21 , 1952 ) is a Spanish actress and voice actress who played Espinete on Barrio Sésamo , the Spanish version of Sesame Street , from 1983 until 1987 .
#Text=Biography

#Text=In subsequent years , Vivares has primarily worked as a dubbing voice actress , and dubbed Castilian Spanish versions of several Jim Henson Company productions , notably as Baby Sinclair in Dinosaurios ( Dinosaurs ) .

#Text=Vivares began her career as an actress in Spanish television , making guest appearances on TV series such as Cuentos y leyendas ( 1975 ) , La señora García se confiesa ( 1976 ) and even the prestigious Estudio 1 ( 1983 ) .
#Text=In 1979 , she entered the dubbing field as a voice actress , first in the Peter Falk movie The In-Laws ( dubbing Nancy Dussault ) , and then as minor characters in Fame .
#Text=In 1983 , Vivares joined Barrio Sésamo as principal puppeteer , performing the full-bodied Espinete , the most identifiable Muppet on the series .

#Text=Her work as Espinete kept her pre-occupied , but when Barrio Sésamo was cancelled in 1987 , Vivares went back behind the microphone , dubbing Penelope Sudrow in the movie A Nightmare on Elm Street 3 .
#Text=She also reprised Espinete in a theatre version of Barrio Sésamo during the late 1980s , touring through Spain alongside other actors from the series such as Sánchez and José Riesgo .

#Text=Vivares became more prolific as a voice actress , most often dubbing child roles or young male actors , such as the character Tommy in The Punisher ( with Dolph Lundgren ) and Peter Brady on The Brady Bunch .
#Text=Her most substantial work was on The Simpsons as Ralph Wiggum , Todd Flanders , Martin Prince , Itchy , and others .

#Text=Other animation dub credits include Bucky the squirrel in Disney 's The Emperor 's New Groove , Amy Wong on Futurama , Mandark on Dexter 's Laboratory , Tails on Sonic the Hedgehog , Stan Marsh on South Park , and Sailor Neptune on Sailor Moon .
#Text=Vivares was also heard in the original Spanish animated features La Leyenda del Viento del Norte ( 1992 ) and ¡ Qué vecinos tan animales !
#Text=( 1998 , Maite Ruiz de Austri )
#Text=as Nicky , the little mouse ( with fellow Barrio Sésamo puppeteer Emma Cohen as the mother mouse ) .
#Text=She also voiced the principal character of " la señorita Ofelia " in multiple computer games adapting the Spanish comic-book Mortadelo y Filemón .
#Text=On-camera , Vivares played a dressmaker in the final episode of the Spanish series Farmacia de guardia ( 1995 ) .
#Text=She made multiple guest appearances on the TV crime drama El Comisario , notably as the distraught mother of a kidnapped child .

#Text=Vivares continues to work primarily as a voice actress , however , dubbing the characters of Moaning Myrtle in the Harry Potter movies , Chloe on Smallville , and parts on Sabrina the Teenage Witch and Charmed .
#Text=She also usually dubs into Castilian Spanish the actresses Ariane Ascaride and Shirley Henderson . [ 1 ]
#Text=Personal life
#Text=Vivares was married to Juan Ramón Sánchez , who played Chema the baker on Barrio Sésamo , from 1979 until his death in 2008 . [ 2 ]
